channel.title: Error when trying to make npc talk
channel.description:
hi thx for helping me again my server is doing pretty good now.
I want 2244 ( lumbridge guide ) to say Welcome
i went into npc handler and typed :
[code] } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2244) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome Funscape Please enjoy your stay"; }[/code]
then i compiled and no errors so i was ;D then i ran server and ....
i entered port
[code]Enter Port (Defalut = 43594): 43594 Port: 43594
[SERVERLOADER] Loading classes: ||Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFor matException: For input string: "1 Lumbridge guide" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1444) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:29) at server.main(server.java:34) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 02:19:10 PM[/size][hr]i get the error from the autospawn aswell so i had to delete the lumvridge guide :(
in my auto spawn i placed it here. i placed it on the last line ( its not there now )
all i wanna do is add the lumbridge guide to talk and welcome people
and i wanna add more npcs saying stuff at my starter place.
[code]//varrock //spawn = 0 3226 3407 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hans //spawn = 2244 3228 3407 0 0 0 0 0 1 Lumbridge Guide //spawn = 19 3230 3407 0 0 0 0 0 1 White Knight
spawn = 2745 3216 3424 0 0 0 0 0 1 TzTok-Jad
spawn = 2627 3210 3424 0 3214 3425 3208 3421 2 Tz-Kih spawn = 2627 3209 3423 0 3214 3425 3208 3421 2 Tz-Kih spawn = 2627 3210 3422 0 3214 3425 3208 3421 2 Tz-Kih spawn = 2627 3211 3424 0 3214 3425 3208 3421 2 Tz-Kih spawn = 2627 3208 3422 0 3214 3425 3208 3421 2 Tz-Kih
spawn = 1702 3187 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker W spawn = 1702 3187 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker W spawn = 1702 3187 3440 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker W spawn = 1702 3187 3442 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker W spawn = 1702 3187 3444 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker W spawn = 1702 3187 3446 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker W
spawn = 1702 3252 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker E spawn = 1702 3253 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker E spawn = 1702 3254 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker E spawn = 1702 3256 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Ghost banker E
spawn = 55 3211 3461 0 0 0 0 0 1 Blue dragon at Castle[/code]

item.title: Error when trying to make npc talk
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

hi thx for helping me again my server is doing pretty good now.

I want 2244 ( lumbridge guide ) to say Welcome

i went into npc handler and typed :

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 2244) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome Funscape Please enjoy your stay"; }

then i compiled and no errors so i was ;D then i ran server and …

i entered port

[code]Enter Port (Defalut = 43594): 43594
Port: 43594

[SERVERLOADER] Loading classes: ||Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFor
matException: For input string: “1 Lumbridge guide”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1444)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:29)
at server.main(server.java:34)
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
